Key Match Events: Hakim Ziyech scored in the first half as Morocco beat Zambia 1-0
Post-Match Reflections: The Ivory Coast sneaked into the last 16 as one of the best third-place finishers
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ivory Coast will play Senegal on Monday
Morocco will play South Africa in the next round
Others: The Congolese finished second in the pool with three points
Tunisia limped out of the Africa Cup of Nations after a 0-0 draw with South Africa
